aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters actions based on the presence of tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters actions based on tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters actions based on the presence of tag keys in the request

ses:ApiVersion.description: Filters actions based on the SES API version

ses:FeedbackAddress.description: Filters actions based on the "Return-Path" address, which specifies where bounces and complaints are sent by email feedback forwarding

ses:FromAddress.description: Filters actions based on the "From" address of a message

ses:FromDisplayName.description: Filters actions based on the "From" address that is used as the display name of a message

ses:Recipients.description: Filters actions based on the recipient addresses of a message, which include the "To", "CC", and "BCC" addresses
